mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.product_id, a.sale_property_key_id, a.sale_property_key_name, b.id sale_property_value_id, b.sale_property_value_name from product_sale_property_key a inner join product_sale_property_value b on a.product_id = b.product_id and a.sale_property_key_id = b.sale_property_key_id where a.product_id = #{productId}

SELECT a.id, a.product_id, a.sale_property_key_id, a.sale_property_key_name, b.id sale_property_value_id, b.sale_property_value_name, c.sku_id, IF( c.sku_id IS NULL, 0, 1 ) is_selected FROM product_sale_property_key a INNER JOIN product_sale_property_value b ON a.product_id = b.product_id AND a.sale_property_key_id = b.sale_property_key_id LEFT JOIN sku_sale_property_value c ON c.sale_property_value_id = b.id AND c.sku_id = #{skuId} WHERE a.product_id = #{productId} ORDER BY b.sale_property_key_id, b.id
